verses.roman:
prātaḥ-kāle īśvara dekhi' saba bhakta lañā
haridāse dekhite āilā śīghra kariyā

synonyms: prātaḥ-kāle—in the morning; īśvara dekhi'-after visiting Lord Jagannātha; saba bhakta—all the devotees; lañā—accompanied by; haridāse—Haridāsa; dekhite—to see; āilā—came; śīghra kariyā—hastily.
translation: The next morning, after visiting the Jagannātha temple, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, accompanied by all His other devotees, came hastily to see Haridāsa Ṭhākura.
